title: Error
body: Please Help i get a error while installing lol the error is: A network error occurred while attempting to read from file:  C\Windows\Installer\LoL.EUNE.msi

replies.body: This may be a result of a few factors like security settings preventing installation or even outdated version of windows.  As a first step make sure that your windows is up to date.  If the issue persists then give the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide a go to configure your security settings.  Hope that helps!
